org.numenta.nupic.network.sensor

Class ObservableSensorTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.network.sensor.ObservableSensorTest

  • public class ObservableSensorTest
extends java.lang.Object
    • Test that the ObservableSensor can be created using the same idioms as other Sensor types.
    • Test that the SensorFactory "functional" method of creation works generically.
    • Test that a Stream can be retrieved from the Sensor, and that that Stream can be "operated" upon.
    • Test that the Stream operation results are consistent.
    Author:
    David Ray
